subject: junitreport at junit3.5
msgSnippet: Hi all We are using Junit3.5 and Ant 1.4.1. In my build.xml file I have my junit task, and afterwards I want to add the junitreport task. I am getting
messageBody:
Hi all
We are using Junit3.5 and Ant 1.4.1. In my build.xml file I have my junit
task, and afterwards I want to add the junitreport task. I am getting
\home\<my_dir>\projects\<my_prj>\build.xml:288: Errors while applying
transformations on the following section:
<junitreport todir="${results.tests}"> <!-- this is line number
288 -->
<fileset dir="${results.tests}">
<include name="TEST-*.xml" />
</fileset>
<report format="frames" todir="${results.tests}/html"/>
</junitreport>
Any ideas?
TIA Oren
